cast.overview: The story of Operation Market Garden—a failed attempt by the allies in the latter stages of WWII to end the war quickly by securing three bridges in Holland allowing access over the Rhine into Germany. A combination of poor allied intelligence and the presence of two crack German panzer divisions meant that the final part of this operation (the bridge in Arnhem over the Rhine) was doomed to failure.
cast.title: A Bridge Too Far

details.biography: John Judd was born on February 23, 1947. He is an actor, known for Scum, A Bridge Too Far and The Prince and the Pauper . He has been married to Helen Shapiro since August 31, 1988.
details.name: John Judd
